item.title: Adding x10 hit multiplayer for any client
item.dc:creator: @n00bish n00bish
item.description:
@n00bish wrote:

Description: Adding the x10 hit multiplayer to any client.
Works on: Any client
Assumed Knowledge: How to use CTRL+F button, paste, copy, etc…
Difficulty: 1/10
Files/Classes Modified: Client.java, Class30_sub2_sub4_sub1.java

(All Client-Sided)
Search in client.java

public static boolean newDamage = false;

If you founded it just change the false to true, if you didn’t find it
search for public final void method447(int i, int j, int k, int l) in class30_sub2_sub4_sub1.java and replace the whole method with this one:

[code] public final void method447(int i, int j, int k, int l)
{
for(int i1 = 0; i1 < 4; i1++)
if(anIntArray1516[i1] <= l)
{
anIntArray1514[i1] = k * ((client.newDamage == true && k > 0) ? 10 : 1);
if (client.newDamage && k > 0) {
anIntArray1514[i1] += new java.util.Random().nextInt(9);
}
anIntArray1515[i1] = j;
anIntArray1516[i1] = l + 70;
return;
}

    if(i != anInt1509)
        aBoolean1508 = !aBoolean1508;
}[/code]

And then go into client.java and add:

public static boolean newDamage = true;

anywhere.

When you want to use the normal hits just change the true to false.

I made this tut because I couldn’t find it anywhere, all I found was for PI but this one works for delta and any other client.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding x10 hit multiplayer for any client
